text: Jun Togawa (戸川純, Togawa Jun) is a Japanese singer, musician and actress. Jun was born in Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan on March 31st, 1961, making her 62 as of 2023. One of her close friends is Susumu Hirasawa. ==Career== Jun made her musical debut with the band Halmens as a guest singer, after gaining attention, she started her solo debut, with the album Tamahime Sama in 1984. Jun has associations with Susumu Hirasawa (平沢進), and her own sister, Kyoko Togawa (戸川京子). She had made her acting debut in the drama Shiawase Senso four years prior to her solo debut. Jun is well known for her acting in TOTO toilet commercials, along with her song Suki Suki Daisuki. == Suki Suki Daisuki == Suki Suki Daisuki is the second track off of her solo album Suki Suki Daisuki, it was released on November 10, 1985. Suki Suki Daisuki is by far her most popular song, after many YouTube and TikTok videos used to sound for videos of a more creepy, or scary nature. Some even call Suki Suki Daisuki a 'Yandere' song. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Tokyo Category:Singers from Tokyo
title: Jun Togawa
